# Openbase

- `pipx install openbase`
- `pipx install multi-workspace` (CLI dependency)
- Make a new directory named after the project you want to create (e.g. `my-project`) and `cd` into it
- Run `openbase init`
- Run `./scripts/setup.sh`
- Open in Cursor
- Press the run button
- Create ./.openbase/DESCRIPTION.md
- Run `openbase generate` to bootstrap a new idea (be patient while it creates).
- Run `openbase server` then go to localhost:8001 to see the Openbase Console
- Coming soon: easy deployment
